title: Crystal Tomato® Supplement - Cove Aesthetic Clinic
description: Crystal Tomato® Supplement is one of the first food supplements in the world to...
cleaned_text: Crystal Tomato® Supplement is one of the first food supplements in the world to offer benefits for the skin from a unique breed of non-genetically modified white tomatoes. Containing Crystal Tomato® Carotenoids which have been scientifically proven to be beneficial for skin health, the supplement is not only a safe and convenient way to beautiful, healthier skin and a more radiant complexion, but has also become a must-have for maintaining and protecting skin quality. Directions: Can be taken anytime, day or night, before food or after food. Recommended to take daily at a regular time (i.e. if a pill is taken in the morning on the 1st day, try to follow the same sequence the following days)
